review: The device gets awfully hot, and it gives me crap for not using the given power adapter (5.0Volt 1.0Amp) even though my TV has a 5.0V 1.0A USB port (it's labeled on the TV). I also don't like the idea it is always on (I know it goes to sleep.) If it didn't warn me about using the TV USB power I wouldn't have that concern because when I shut my TV off it would kill the power to the Fire TV Stick.If I didn't get it 'free' with my 3 month Sling TV purchase I'd likely send it back.
